message.description: The message content of the SNS notification.

phone_number.description: Phone number if message is delivered via SMS Specify this, topic_arn or target_arn

send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.

sigv4.description: Configure the AWS Signature Verification 4 signing process

subject.description: The subject line if message is delivered to an email endpoint.

target_arn.description: Mobile platform endpoint ARN if message is delivered via mobile notifications Specify this, topic_arn or phone_number

topic_arn.description: SNS topic ARN, either specify this, phone_number or target_arn
